issue.title: [Python] No builds for macOS arm64.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16277](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16277). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Nightly builds no longer include a build for macOS for arm64. The last one to do so was 8.0.0.dev312.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16277?focusedCommentId=17527818) by A. Coady (coady):*
macOS arm64 is building nightly again.
